OrgName.entry: ACTIVITY SHEFFIELD - NORTH EAST COMMUNITY ASSEMBLY

Desc.entry: Aims to increase physical opportunities within the wards of the North and Central Community Assemblies. Core target audience is children and young people aged between 8-16 and adults aged 50 years and over. Runs activities for children and young people including community clubs from 4.30pm onwards on a daily basis, sports camps during school holidays, arts and crafts. Activities for adults aged 50 years and over include chair based exercise, gentle exercise sessions and active sport specific sessions. Also offers training opportunities with regular sports related courses including Sports Leadership and sports specific course eg (Football Coaching Level 2) and offers club development support to new and existing groups.

ContactName.entry: Nick Gill, North East Development Officer
